Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Wynn Las Vegas in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a casino and a nightclub. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 14 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 14 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a casino and a nightclub. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

With a stay at Wynn Las Vegas in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fashion Show Mall - 0 km / 0 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
High Roller - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
The Linq - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Crystals at City Center - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Boulevard Mall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Clark County Library - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Wynn Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Wynn Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

RoomType.text: Double Wynn Resort Room
Double Wynn Resort King Room
Double Wynn Resort Room
Double Wynn Resort Room
Double Wynn Panoramic View Room

Message.Text:
A mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $45 plus tax, per room, per day will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out for all U.S and International clients. This fee is subject to change without notice. The information published here is to give clients an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. Please see hotel policies for fee inclusions.

The hotel will be under renovation. Massage & esthetician services will be performed in the Wynn Tower (60th floor). The sauna & other wet area facilities will not be available. For full spa experience, guests will be directed to Encore. Please note renovation dates are subject to change at any time without prior notification.

Due to the renovation, the following areas will be impacted: Fitness Center relocated to Chairman’s Salon; Wynn Salon closed, guests will be directed to Encore Salon for services (no satellite services available for Salon treatments); Wynn Spa Retail closed, guests directed to Encore Spa Retail. Please note renovation dates are subject to change at any time without prior notification.

RoomType.text: Double Wynn Panoramic View Room

Message.Text:
RESORT FEE 45$+13.38%TAX PER NIGHT HAS TO BE PAID DIRECTLY BY GUEST ON SPOT// RESORT FEE $45+13.38%TASAS NO ESTAN INCLUIDAS EN LAS TARIFAS Y SE DEBERAN PAGAR DIRECTAMENTE EN EL ALOJAMIENTO.

*** MAJORITY OF AGE AT THIS HOTEL IS 21 YEARS-OLD // LA MAYORIA DE EDAD EN ESTE HOTEL ES 21 A¥OS *** *** GUESTS UNDER 21 YEARS OLD WON'T BE ALLOWED TO CHECK-IN UNLESS THEY ARE ACCOMPANIED BY SOMEONE WITH 21 YEARS OLD OR OLDER // LOS CLIENTES CON MENOS DE 21 A¥OS NO PODRAN INGRESAR EN EL HOTEL SIN ESTAR ACOMPA¥ADOS POR UN ADULTO DE 21 A¥OS O MAS ***

SWIMMING POOL TIMETABLES FROM 8th MARCH: WYNN: TOWER SUITES POOL (8.00am-5.00pm) RESORT POOL(8.00am-5.00pm) EUROPEAN POOL(8.00am-5.00pm) JACUZZI (8.00am-5.00pm)

THERE'S NO POSSIBLE TO DO ANY MODIFICATION ON THE DATES//NO ES POSIBLE MODIFICAR NINGUNA FECHA DE LAS RESERVAS

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION: FOR THOSE RESERVATIONS WITH MORE THAN 1 ROOM BOOKEDTHE TITULAR OF THE RESERVATION MUST DO THE CHECK-IN FOR ALL THE ROOMS AND THE HOTEL WON'T AUTHORISE ANY NAME CHANGES // *** INFORMACION IMPORTANTE: PARA AQUELLAS RESERVAS QUE INCLUYAN MAS DE UNA HABITACION, EL TITULAR DE LA RESERVADEBERA EFECTUAR EL CHECK-IN DE TODAS LAS HABITACIONES Y EL HOTEL NO PERMITIRA CAMBIOS DE NOMBRE.

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%

RoomType.text: Twin Wynn Tower Suite + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 17/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 20/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Please note that a daily Resort Fee of USD $39.00 plus tax per room per night is payable directly to the hotel. The hotel requires a security deposit of $150,00 for each day of stay for incidentals. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE breakfasts per day. Any additional breakfasts will need to be paid directly to hotel. SELF-PARKING FEE (through June 30, 2018) ? No charge 0 ? 59 minutes ? $7 1 ? 2 hours ? $12 2 ? 4 hours ? $15 4 ? 24 hours ? $15 each additional 24 hours VALET PARKING FEE ? $18 0 ? 2 hours ? $22 2 ? 4 hours ? $27 4+ hours As of July 1, 2018, a new parking validation policy that will allow guests to self-park or valet complimentary will be implemented. Free parking will also be included as part of the resort fee for all registered hotel guests. For non-hotel guests and local residents, self-parking and valet will be validated once per day, per vehicle upon receipt of a $50 spend within Wynn or Encore. Tower Suite Pool 8am to 5pm Resort Pool 8am to 5pm European Pool 8am to 5pm Jacuzzi 8am to 5pm Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Twin Wynn Tower Suite + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 09/May/2016 to 31/Dec/9999
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 17/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Please note that a daily Resort Fee of USD $35.00 plus tax per room per night is payable directly to the hotel for all package rate plans. For some bed and breakfast rates, a maximum two breakfasts will be provided, additional breakfast will be payable direct to hotel. For all land-only rate-plans there is a MANDATORY $35.00 plus tax, per room, per night is payable directly to the hotel. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE breakfasts per day. Any additional breakfasts will need to be paid directly to hotel. Effective from Dec12 onwards, valet service will be subject to a parking fee based on the length of time as follow: $13,00 for the first 4 hours per vehicle $18,00 from 4 hours to 24 hours per vehicle From Dec12'2016 the pool and Cabanas at Wynn will be closed for annual preventive maintenance. In the interim, Wynn guests may use Encore pools during operation hours until maintanance is completed. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Effective from Dec12 onwards, valet service will be subject to a parking fee based on the length of time as follow: $13,00 for the first 4 hours per vehicle $18,00 from 4 hours to 24 hours per vehicle From Dec12'2016 the pool and Cabanas at Wynn will be closed for annual preventive maintenance. In the interim, Wynn guests may use Encore pools during operation hours until maintanance is completed. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE breakfasts per day. Any additional breakfasts will need to be paid directly to hotel. Effective from Dec12 onwards, valet service will be subject to a parking fee based on the length of time as follow: $13,00 for the first 4 hours per vehicle $18,00 from 4 hours to 24 hours per vehicle From Dec12'2016 the pool and Cabanas at Wynn will be closed for annual preventive maintenance. In the interim, Wynn guests may use Encore pools during operation hours until maintanance is completed. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Wynn Resort King Room

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 17/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 20/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Please note that a daily Resort Fee of USD $39.00 plus tax per room per night is payable directly to the hotel. The hotel requires a security deposit of $150,00 for each day of stay for incidentals. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE breakfasts per day. Any additional breakfasts will need to be paid directly to hotel. SELF-PARKING FEE (through June 30, 2018) ? No charge 0 ? 59 minutes ? $7 1 ? 2 hours ? $12 2 ? 4 hours ? $15 4 ? 24 hours ? $15 each additional 24 hours VALET PARKING FEE ? $18 0 ? 2 hours ? $22 2 ? 4 hours ? $27 4+ hours As of July 1, 2018, a new parking validation policy that will allow guests to self-park or valet complimentary will be implemented. Free parking will also be included as part of the resort fee for all registered hotel guests. For non-hotel guests and local residents, self-parking and valet will be validated once per day, per vehicle upon receipt of a $50 spend within Wynn or Encore.
